title: Server Side Rendering a Random Number
summary: If you are not careful, rendering a random number with SSR can lead to inconsistencies.
long_summary: On a recent project of mine, I was trying to create a component with some randomized parameters in SvelteKit. To my dismay, SvelteKit's server-side rendering was causing a problem! Let's talk about what the problem was and how to render random numbers with SSR.
